alert.note: Alert for Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains; Ventura County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 29 at 5:39AM PST until January 30 at 3:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 3 PM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Light to moderate snow is expected. Snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches are expected at elevations between 3000 and 4500 feet with 3 to 6 inches above 4500 feet. * WHERE...Ventura County Mountains and Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 3 PM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Very slippery and dangerous road conditions are expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light snow accumulation possible on area roadways down to around 3000 feet including portions of Highway 33 and Lockwood Valley Road.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions from CalTrans are available by calling 1 800 4 2 7 7 6 2 3.

area.areaDesc: Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains; Ventura County Mountains
